author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Forgot Something
body:
Hey Bruce you didn't mention that you can get a UK dub of Goodbye Lady 
Liberty at Manga's Uk website. In fact the address is 
http://www.manga.co.uk/index2.html It's not easy to find, but you can find 
it somewhere in their video catalogue section.
